```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(janitor)

```

```{r data}

groves <- vect(here("data/spatial_data/SEKI_groves/SEKI_groves_list.shp")) %>% 
  st_as_sf()

existing_plots <-read_csv(here("data/spatial_data/all_plots_groves_env.csv"))

aspect <- vect(here("data/spatial_data/aspect_polys.shp")) %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  st_transform(crs(groves))

trt <- vect(here("data/spatial_data/trt/SEGI_Trtdata_05feb25.shp")) %>% 
  project(crs(groves))

fire <- vect(here("data/spatial_data/cbi_all/cbi_all.shp")) %>% 
  project(crs(groves))

no_fire <- read_sf(here("data/spatial_data/no_fire/no_fire.shp")) %>% 
  st_transform(crs(groves))

plots_sf <- st_read(here("data/spatial_data/all_plots_groves.shp")) 
```



```{r transform}
groves_vect <- vect(groves)
aspect_vect <- vect(aspect)

rx_seki <- trt %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  filter(treatment == "Fire-related treatment") %>%  
  vect() %>% 
  intersect(groves_vect) %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  st_collection_extract(type = c("POLYGON"), warn = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(burnsev = 2,
         id = paste(grov_nm, year, rowid, sep = "_"))%>% 
  rename(fire_yr = year)%>% 
  select(id, fire_yr, burnsev)

no_burn <- no_fire %>% 
  mutate(
    burnsev = 0,
    fire_yr = 0000,
    id = "unburned"
  )%>% 
  select(id, fire_yr, burnsev)
  

aspect_groves <- intersect(aspect_vect, groves_vect) %>% 
  st_as_sf()%>% 
  mutate(aspect = case_when(
    Id == 1 ~ "NW to E",
    Id == 2 ~ "SE to W"
  ))


burn <- intersect(fire, groves_vect) %>% 
  st_as_sf()%>%
  mutate(fire_yr = as.numeric(fire_yr)) %>% 
  select(id, fire_yr, burnsev) %>% 
  bind_rows(rx_seki) %>% 
  bind_rows(no_burn)

grove_area <- sum(groves$grovr_h)
```

```{r plots}

plot_types <- existing_plots %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(grove_name, project), count = n()) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = project, values_from = count) %>% 
  adorn_totals()

write_csv(plot_types, here("data/plotTypes.csv"))

plots_rx <- st_intersection(rx_seki, plots_sf)

plots_rx_count <- plots_rx %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  summarise(.by = plot_id, trt_ct = n())

plots_rx_yr <- plots_rx %>% 
  group_by(plot_id) %>% 
  slice_max(fire_yr) %>% 
  rename(trt_yr = fire_yr) %>% 
  left_join(plots_rx_count) %>% 
  mutate(sev = "Low") %>% 
  select(plot_id, trt_yr, trt_ct, sev) %>% 
  st_drop_geometry()


totals_summary <- existing_plots %>% 
  summarise(.by = c(grove_name), total = n())

plot_total <-  sum(totals_summary$total)

plots_all <- existing_plots %>% 
  left_join(plots_rx_yr) %>% 
  replace_na(list(trt_yr = 0000, trt_ct = 0, sev = "Unburned")) %>% 
  mutate(
    fire_yr = as.numeric(fire_yr),
    burnsev = case_when(fire_yr<trt_yr ~ sev, T ~ burnsev),
    fire_yr = case_when(fire_yr<trt_yr ~ trt_yr, T ~ fire_yr),
    fire_count = fire_count+trt_ct
  )

plots_classified <- plots_all %>% 
   mutate(
     burnsev = case_when(burnsev == "Undetected change" ~ "Unburned",
                         T ~ burnsev),
     aspect = case_when(
     aspect <= 90 | aspect > 315~ "NW to E",
     T ~ "SE to W"),
     time_since = case_when(
       fire_yr == 0000 ~ "more_than_five",
       fire_yr  >= 2020 ~ "five_or_less",
       T ~ "more_than_five"
     ),
     count = case_when(fire_count >= 2 ~ "multiple",
                      T ~ "one or none"))

plot_sets <- plots_classified %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(aspect, burnsev, time_since, count), count_plot = n()) %>% 
  mutate(prop_plot = round(count_plot/plot_total, 2))

```

```{r grove_setup}

burn_count <- burn %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(id, fire_yr, burnsev), geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>% 
  st_make_valid() %>% 
  arrange(-fire_yr)

burn_id <- burn_count %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  rowid_to_column("rid")

fire_count <- st_intersection(burn_count) %>% 
  st_collection_extract(type = c("POLYGON"), warn = FALSE)

burn_classed <- fire_count %>%
  mutate(time_since = case_when(
       fire_yr == 0000 ~ "more_than_five",
       fire_yr  >= 2020 ~ "five_or_less",
       T ~ "more_than_five"
     ),
    burnsev = case_when(
      burnsev == 0 ~ "Unburned",
      burnsev == 1 ~ "Unburned",
      burnsev == 2 ~ "Low",
      burnsev == 3 ~ "Moderate",
      burnsev == 4 ~ "High",
      T ~ "Unburned"
     ),
    count = case_when(n.overlaps >= 2 ~ "multiple",
                      T ~ "one or none")) %>%
  summarize(.by = c(time_since, burnsev, count), geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>% 
  st_make_valid() 



groves_set <- burn_classed %>% 
  st_intersection(aspect_groves) %>% 
  st_collection_extract(type = c("POLYGON"), warn = FALSE) %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(aspect, time_since, burnsev, count), geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>% 
  st_make_valid() %>% 
  mutate(area_ha = as.numeric(st_area(.))*0.0001,
         prop_area = round(area_ha/grove_area, 2))# %>% 
  st_drop_geometry()

write_sf(groves_set, here("data/spatial_data/grove_strata_24march25.shp"))

#aspect_poly <- st_read(here("data/spatial_data/aspect_polys.shp")) %>%
```

#By Grove

```{r}
grove_plot_sets <- plots_classified %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(grove_name, aspect, burnsev, time_since, count), count_plot = n()) %>% 
  mutate(prop_plot = round(count_plot/plot_total, 2))

bygroves_set <- burn_classed %>% 
  st_intersection(aspect_groves) %>% 
  st_collection_extract(type = c("POLYGON"), warn = FALSE) %>% 
  summarize(.by = c(grov_nm, aspect, time_since, burnsev, count), geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>% 
  st_make_valid() %>% 
  mutate(area_ha = as.numeric(st_area(.))*0.0001,
         prop_area = round(area_ha/grove_area, 2)) %>% 
  st_drop_geometry()
  
grovecomparison_sets <- bygroves_set %>% 
  left_join(grove_plot_sets, join_by(grov_nm == grove_name, aspect, time_since, burnsev, count)) %>% 
  replace_na(list(prop_plot = 0, count_plot = 0)) %>% 
  mutate(count = case_when(burnsev == "Unburned" & count == "one or none"~ "one or none",
                           count == "multiple" ~ count,
                           T ~ "one"),
         area_ha = round(area_ha, 2),
         diff = prop_area - prop_plot) 

write_csv(grovecomparison_sets, here("data/grove_strata_set_comparison_19March25.csv"))


```



# Plots Needed

```{r}
#grove info
grove_plots <- grove_plot_sets %>% 
  summarise(.by = grove_name, plots = sum(count_plot))

grove_access <- readxl::read_excel(here("data/grove_prioritization.xlsx"), "grove_access") %>%   clean_names() %>% 
  select(grove, grove_ha, ease_of_access) %>% 
  mutate(grove_acres = grove_ha*2.471) %>% 
  rename(grove_name = grove) %>% 
  left_join(grove_plots) %>% 
  replace_na(list(plots = 0)) %>% 
  mutate(total_per = plots/grove_acres)


```


```{r}
plots_needed <- readxl::read_excel(here("data/grove_prioritization.xlsx"), "plot_needs") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rowid_to_column()

visit_groves_setup <- grovecomparison_sets %>% 
  rename(
    set_area_ha = area_ha,
    set_prop_area = prop_area,
    set_prop_plot = prop_plot,
    set_count = count_plot,
    set_diff = diff) %>% 
  mutate(set_area_acres = set_area_ha*2.471) %>% 
  left_join(grove_access, join_by(grov_nm == grove_name)) %>% 
  mutate(grove_plots = plots) %>% 
  left_join(plots_needed, join_by(aspect, time_since, burnsev, count)) %>% 
  select(rowid, aspect, time_since, burnsev, count, grov_nm, set_area_acres, set_diff,
         ease_of_access, grove_acres, grove_plots, total_per, prop_area, count_plots_needed) 

#this filters out 3 of the very uncommon strata 
visit_groves <- visit_groves_setup%>% 
  filter(set_area_acres >= 50, 
         count_plots_needed > 0, 
         ease_of_access != "Very Difficult"
         ) %>% 
  arrange(aspect, time_since, burnsev, count)


#check how many strata
visit_groves_have <- visit_groves %>% 
  summarise(.by= c(aspect, time_since, burnsev, count))

#isolate the 3 that are missing
need_plots_missing<- plots_needed %>% 
  filter(count_plots_needed > 0) %>% 
  arrange(area_ha) %>% 
  head(3)

add_groves <- visit_groves_setup %>% 
  filter(rowid %in% unique(need_plots_missing$rowid)) %>% 
  filter(set_area_acres>=3, ease_of_access != "Very Difficult") 

#combine
visit_groves <- visit_groves %>% 
  rbind(add_groves)

write_csv(visit_groves, here("data/filtered_grove_options.csv"))

```



```{r}

summary_visit_grove <- visit_groves %>% 
  summarise(.by = grov_nm, new_strata = n(), strata_list = list(rowid)) %>%

  mutate(strata_list = paste(strata_list))
write_csv(summary_visit_grove, here("data/grove_options.csv"))

summary_visit_strata <- visit_groves %>%

  left_join(plots_needed) %>%

write_csv(summary_visit_strata, here("data/strata_options.csv"))
```
